short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyber Soldier is a cool shooting game. Now you are tasked to the dangerous monster world to wipe out the monsters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyber Soldier is a cool shooting game. Now you are tasked to the dangerous monster world to wipe out the monsters. Hold your gun to shoot them bravely. Jump on different platforms, dodge different obstacles and the attack of the monsters, collect stars. I'm sure you will have good shooting achievements. Good luck!
